basics.name: Klea Ziu
basics.summary: PhD Student at MBZUAI focused on multimodal machine learning, robust visual recognition, and AI for sustainability.

education.institution: Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI)

publications.name: DAG: Dynamic Adversarial Grouping for Robust Visual Recognition
publications.summary: Dynamic adversarial grouping method for robust visual recognition.

publications.name: MirrorCheck: Efficient Adversarial Attacks via Pruning and Connectivity-Preserving Rewiring on Vision Transformers
publications.summary: Efficient adversarial attacks on vision transformers via pruning and rewiring.

publications.name: Towards Domain-Informed Adaptation of Foundation Models for Sustainable Development Goals
publications.summary: Domain-informed adaptation of foundation models for SDGs.

publications.name: A zero-dimensional model for integrating renewable hydrogen into microgrids and remote grids
publications.summary: Modeling integration of renewable hydrogen in microgrids and remote grids.

publications.name: Comparative Life Cycle Assessment of Green and Gray Hydrogen for Fuel Cell Buses in Three European Cities
publications.summary: Comparative LCA for green and gray hydrogen pathways in transport.
